ClipboardManager Class Reference

Interface to the clipboard service, for placing and retrieving text in the global clipboard. More...

#include <ClipboardManager.h>

Detailed Description

Interface to the clipboard service, for placing and retrieving text in the global clipboard. 

  //Create your ClipboardManager
  void DemoPage::onInit(Persistence* const savedInstanceState) {
     // create a context for ClipboardManager
     mpContext = new Context(this);
     mpClipboardMgr = new gaia::content::ClipboardManager(this, mpContext);
     // create a primary clip changed listener to listen to clipboard status
     mpListener = new ClipboardTestListener(this);
     mpClipboardMgr->registerOnPrimaryClipChangedListener(mpListener);
  }
